title: Mark Consuelos jokes he 'would've been married 3 or 4 times' without wife Kelly Ripa on her birthday
text:
Kelly Ripa's 49th birthday marks 23 celebrated with her husband Mark Consuelos.

And the Riverdale star was sure to make a splash for her special day on Wednesday.

The 48-year-old posted a sweet series of photos of his wife throughout her life and was sure to mention the impact she has had on his life.

He thanked her for being born and saving him from multiple divorces.

Lovebirds: Mark Consuelos posted sweet photos of his wife Kelly Ripa to Instagram to mark her 49th birthday on Wednesday and was sure to joke that he would be married '3 or 4 times' without her

He had some kind words to say about his wife but was sure to keep it a bit lighthearted with some jokes.

'Happy Birthday to my Fave..I'm really glad you were born,' he wrote. 'Because let's face it, if you weren't, I would've been married 3 or 4 times by now.'

Mark continued: 'Which would've been really expensive, not to mention the super tense parent teacher conferences and all the awkward blended family holiday/vacations. Anyway, happy birthday sweetie.'

The couple eloped in May 1996 and share three children: Michael, 22, Lola, 18, Joaquin, 16.

Back then: Mark shared a few heartwarming photos of him and his wife throughout the years

Flawless: Kelly looks stunning in this photoshoot of her holding a payphone in a pink silk number

He accompanied it with a slideshow of photos featuring Kelly as a child and a few special moments of the couple together.

The longtime TV host headed into work on her birthday and was surprised with flowers from her husband and a decked-out dressing room thanks to her co-host Ryan Seacrest, 44.

She took to her Instagram story to share a lavish display of white roses gifted to her by her former co-star with a funny card that said 'Happy bday eve Love, M (Not Madonna).'

Baby photos: Mark didn't let Kelly get away without a few baby photos. She is seen above in a white dress and matching hat

When she arrived at work for the day, the American Housewife actress headed into her dressing room for hair and makeup only to find it had been covered in balloons and gifts by Ryan.

Her co-host went all out for the occasion and even had large gold balloons that spelled out her name in the center of the room.

'Nobody told me it was my final birthday!' she said in the video as she saw the surprise.

Stunning: Mark gifted his leading lady some white flowers in a glass bowl full of water

Not Madonna: Her husband Mark sent her some flowers and sent a funny card along with the gift that Kelly thought was too funny not to share

Wardrobe change: For the show she put on a gray snakeskin maxi dress and had her short blonde hair loosely curled

Birthday surprise: Ryan gifted the star a card after decking out her dressing room. The two are pictured above walking to set to begin their show
description: Mark Consuelos thanked his wife Kelly Ripa for being born and saving him from multiple divorces. The actor posted a sweet series of photos on his wife's 49th birthday.
